what: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Test data (SDTM) pharmaverse family packages

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: provide one-stop-shop SDTM test data pharmaverse family packages. includes datasets therapeutic area (TA)-agnostic (DM, VS, EG, etc.) well TA-specific ones (RS, TR, OE, etc.).

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: package available CRAN can installed running install.packages("pharmaversesdtm"). install latest development version package directly GitHub use following code:

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: test datasets sourced CDISC pilot project, datasets constructed ad-hoc admiral team. Please check Reference page detailed information regarding source specific datasets.

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Datasets TA-agnostic: SDTM domain name (e.g., dm, rs). Datasets TA-specific: domain_TA_others, others go broader categories specific ones (e.g., oe_ophtha, rs_onco, rs_onco_irecist). Note: SDTM domain used multiple TAs, pharmaversesdtm may provide multiple versions corresponding test dataset. instance, package contains ex ex_ophtha latter contains ophthalmology-specific variables EXLAT EXLOC, EXROUTE exchanged plausible ophthalmology value.

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Firstly, make GitHub issue {pharmaversesdtm} planned updates tag @pharmaverse/admiral one development core team can sanity check request. two main ways extend test data: either adding new datasets extending existing datasets new records/variables. Whichever method choose, worth noting following: Programs generate test data stored data-raw/ folder. programs written standalone R script: packages need loaded given program, call library() start program (please call library(pharmaversesdtm)). packages likely need already specified renv.lock file, already installed keeping sync–can check entering renv::status() Console. However, may also wish install metatools, currently specified renv.lock file. feel need install packages addition just mentioned, please tag @pharmaverse/admiral discuss development core team. created program data-raw/ folder, need run standalone R script, order generate test dataset become part pharmaversesdtm package, need build package. Following best practice, dataset stored .rda file whose name consistent name dataset, e.g., dataset xx stored xx.rda. easiest way achieve use usethis::use_data(xx) programs data-raw/ stored within pharmaversesdtm GitHub repository, part pharmaversesdtm package–data-raw/ folder specified .Rbuildignore. run program data-raw/ folder, generate dataset written data/ folder, become part pharmaversesdtm package. names sources test datasets specified R/data.R, purpose generating documentation man/ folder.

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Use CDISC pilot data dm input program order create realistic synthetic data remains consistent domains (mandatory). Note personal data used part package, even anonymized. Run program. Reflect update, specifying <name> R/data.R. Run devtools::document() order update NAMESPACE update .Rd files man/. Add GitHub handle .github/CODEOWNERS. Update NEWS.md.

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Locate existing program <name>.R data-raw/ folder, update accordingly. Run program, output updated <name>.rda data/ folder. Run devtools::document() order update NAMESPACE update .Rd files man/. Add GitHub handle .github/CODEOWNERS. Update NEWS.md.

title: pharmaversesdtm 0.1.0
text: Ophthalmology variants ex qs SDTM datasets added. (#15) Migrate data function get_terms() admiral.test. (#1, #49) Oncology datasets tu_onco_recist, tr_onco_recist, rs_onco_recist using RECIST 1.1 response criteria. datasets contain just patients. intended vignettes examples ADaM datasets creation. (#33)
